name: .21 template created for anon artists to submit their anon ideas. by art grant applicant
description:
vr firms and artists coming together to do great things. we are negating the need for art funding agency elitist gatekeeping. #web3

please email [artgrantapplicant at pm dot me] with this application filled out.

your project will be minted in this album asap.

price yet to be determined by VR firm general estimate (coming soon). will utilize custom smart collaboration contracts. it's only important to stay anon until your vr version project is funded, after that it's fair game.

- 50% of the proceeds go to you
- 50% go towards hiring a VR firm to create a virtual reality version of your project*.
     * links to those will be minted in this wallet as a NFT. 

all the technical aspects are coming together but you get the general idea hopefully. will also mint an example filled out. this just bears discussion.
